name: Sunreacher
description:
A space boy tries to chase the sun to make the day longer. Always getting closer but he can't reach the sun.

Travel as far as you can and try to reach the sun before it sets.

You only have to stay alive until the sun goes down.

Game created for the Games Jobs Live Game Parade Game Jam 2020 by Pieter Jollans, music samples kindly provided by Universal Production Music.
